[1m[4mMacros with Quoted Attributes[0m
Test all macros that support positional attributes with quoted values.

[38;2;215;0;135m[1mâ”„[0m[38;2;215;0;135m[1mBlock Image[0m

[38;2;215;0;135m[1mâ”„[0m[38;2;215;0;135m[1mInline Macros[0m
Inline image: [Image: icon.png]
Icon with quoted title: [Icon: heart]
